translations: v.在……上雕刻；给……深刻的印象（engrave 的 ing 形式）

phrs.translation: 雕刻机；刻模机；带有缩放仪的平面仿形铣床

sentences.sentence: The anthropologist Alexander Marshack has an interesting interpretation of some of the engravings made during the Upper Paleolithic.
sentences.translation: 人类学家亚历山大·马沙克对旧石器时代晚期的一些雕刻有一个有趣的解释。

sentences.sentence: Certain features of these engravings lead to the conclusion that they are of great age—geological changes had clearly happened after the designs had been made.
sentences.translation: 这些雕刻的某些特征让人得出它们年代久远的结论——这些设计完成之后显然有地质变化发生。

sentences.sentence: Indeed, sites with engravings of geometric shapes are also to be found on the island of Tasmania, which was separated from the mainland of the continent some 10,000 years ago.
sentences.translation: 事实上，塔斯马尼亚岛上也能看到一些有几何图形镌刻的遗址，该岛大约一万年前从该洲大陆分离出来。
